review: ♫ NOW I'VE GOT HEARTACHES BY THE NUMBER, TROUBLES BY THE SCORE ♫
Its as hard as a rock, but its fun to play
Most fun you can have by yourself

gameplay is as limp as my ♥♥♥♥, 3/10
